code: import{Heading,HStack,Image,Text,VStack,Stack}from"@chakra-ui/react";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import{faArrowRight}from"@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";import React from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Card=_ref=>{let{title,description,imageSrc}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{background:"white",color:"black",borderRadius:"md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VStack,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:imageSrc,alt:title,borderRadius:"md"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{as:"h5",noOfLines:1,size:"md",color:"black",textAlign:"center",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"sm",padding:"2",children:description})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HStack,{padding:"2",spacing:"2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontSize:"sm",children:"See more"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faArrowRight})]})]});};export default Card;
